website_summaries.verdict: One size truly fits all. This amazingly priced tissue box cover is attractive and will fit many different boxes with its adjustable height design.
pros: This quality, highly durable bamboo cover is simple with a classic, timeless appeal
The adjustable height allows you to use it with a huge amount of different sized boxes
cons: The adjustable slat can stick on occasion

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as described and precisely what I was looking for. I despise fighting with the last few tissues in a box...having to toss the box around just to get one out. The cover is just the right weight to keep the box in place while pulling. I love bamboo. It's the most awesome grass around. A great looking product, great functionality, and for a great price. I haven't tested the "hiding spot" functionality, but I can see how it may be legit. I only wish it was also available in other colors. A darker stain would fit some of my other furniture better.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Tippler

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: I would be very happy with this quality item if it wasn’t for the fact that when it arrived it is constructed incorrectly and is unusable! If you notice in the picture the slats were installed upside down which makes loading a box impossible. Seller, please inspect before shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Upscale touch for a boring office desk; great gift for OCD sufferers
customer_reviews.text: Can't stand cardboard flowery Kleenex boxes in old lady blue, coffee drip brown, or heinous washed out green. They make me want to beat my cat or kick the kids! My therapist recommended one of these and I'm more calm now, never pick my nose anymore, and finally I enjoy sneezing again. Well made product, clever design, and accommodates virtually ANY tissue box you could imagine. Seriously, a well-made product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: What a practical tissue holder to accommodate any size box! I love that the height can be easily adjusted. Typically, I used the large boxes of tissue from Costco, and this is the perfect size for them. I ordered three and liked them so much that I ordered four more. I'm prone to have a box of tissue in almost every room of my house for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy, I bought one, and it cracked across the top in about three weeks. They sent me a replacement, and now about three weeks later it is also cracked across the top. Look else where, you've been warned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: What a great tissue box!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a tissue box for years, but this rectangular PandPal One Size Fits All Tissue Box Cover is the first one I've ever found that works as beautifully as it looks. Tissues pop right out without my having to hold the box down. The well-crafted box hides today's crop of hideously ugly tissue boxes. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: bjj

customer_reviews.title: Clean and functional design.
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most is the clean and functional design. The smooth joints are just nice to handle, and teh boxes are of a sufficient heft, that I should have these...for me...forever. I take very good care of my things and typically have them 10+ years, if I like them. The (two boxes I ordered) come with two small slats that are moveable, depending on the size of the tissue box. I placed loose pop-up tissues in one of the boxes as well, and they are supported sufficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Ciel

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this as I needed a cover for large size Kleenex boxes for in the bathroom. This looked perfect but sadly I had to return it. Its also a very yellowy-brown making the fake wood look totally fake!
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: We had this for two weeks before the top started cracking. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cabe

customer_reviews.title: ... use for C fold paper towels and it works perfect. Any other counter top dispenser for C Fold ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for C fold paper towels and it works perfect. Any other counter top dispenser for C Fold towels was 3X as much money and so I thought I would take a chance and it worked perfect. Quality is great, I will say for a tissue box on a counter or night stand it would be pretty big, be sure to look at the measurements and be sure you are o.k. with something that big.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for tall Kleenex 230ct - Costco
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Costco Tall Kleenex 230ct. No adjuster needed. One drawback is the unlock bottom, its basically tissue box cover. So when you move the box, the bottom stay or came off. Craftsmanship is hit & miss. Received the one with crack corner, hopefully it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Supardi Dermawan

customer_reviews.title: Wood split after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tissue box in March 2020. I liked the simple style and the adjustability. But in August, the wood has already split on the top. See photo. Note that it has been sitting on a countertop without dropping or hitting anything. I am very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Good , smooth finish. Nice for my office. The cover didn't quite fit the overly large box of tissues (measured about 1/4" too tall) I have, but if I'd removed the bottom it would have made it. I wanted to keep the complete cover together, so the slight lack of fit is tolerable. Next time I'll buy a smaller box!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Ealy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Tissue Box Cover/Holder!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully crafted and designed tissue box. We were sick of small tissue boxes that hold only a few tissues and come out in clumps. The large size box is cheaper, si this makes a great cover. I just ordered three more.
customer_reviews.author: Groovy Gammy

customer_reviews.title: Works with Big Tissue Boxes!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a cover which would fit the large tissue boxes from warehouse stores. This is the only one I have found which will work! It's well made, looks very nice, and due to the fact that the little slats keep the boxes snugged up to the top of the holder, the tissues are fed through nicely so they never fall down inside the box and have to be fished out from the bottom. Very happy with this find!
customer_reviews.author: will_annie

customer_reviews.title: The only one that fits the value size box
customer_reviews.text: This is the only one I have found that fits the jumbo size Kleenex box without having to chop up the box to make it fit properly. I just drop it in and the cover goes on top. I wish they had more styles and colors though. Then I could buy one for every room!
customer_reviews.author: AZDancer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this product I was very happy that it fit Kleenex tissue box but it was falling apart at the corners And once it fell down it BROKE APART!! Horrible product
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a decent tissue box cover for a while. I ended up buying two of these because they're so versatile and beautiful. I love that any size tissue box will fit in there because of the slats and lifts even though we only buy the huge boxes from CostCo, which fit perfectly. It's a substantial weight so the box come up when you pull a tissue out when the box is running low. I may have to buy more of these for around the house.
customer_reviews.author: lissa0780

customer_reviews.title: Wood split and cupped on top
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bamboo holder for tissue boxes for about 1.5 years. It began splitting on the top within a month of purchase. The wood is also cupping. If it were not for this issue, I would love it. With the defect, I’m fairly unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Nice to hide those ugly tissue boxes
customer_reviews.text: It was nice to find something adjustable to put the tissue boxes in....Only complaint is you can see the seams where the wood was put together... Some might not notice I just notice the little things... Does what it is supposed to though....
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic value for a great product.  Does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant. I bought two of them to hold down the tissue box once you get to the end so the box doesn't go flying and they work perfectly. First of all, they can size any kind of rectangular tissue box (I get the shorter and the taller boxes) because of the simple, yet effective inserts inside the box. Secondly, they are sturdy and heavy enough to do the job. Finally, the craftsmanship is present and it looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Truly Great
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nice finish and color. I purchased two and am very pleased with both. They arrived in perfect condition and are working well for me. These tissue box covers truly fit all sizes of facial tissue boxes and look so much better than the awful designs on the cardboard box!
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

customer_reviews.title: You can put a "box of Kirkland" tissues inside, i.e. you don't have to remove the tissues
customer_reviews.text: As advertised... many of these tissue boxes are not specific as to whether you can put a box of kleenex inside or have to remove the tissues. Well I use Kirkland tissues in the half box size. It not only fits the box just right, I can store another full box of tissues under the first box. Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Versatility!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, good quality, and it's easy to adjust the level so any tissue box works well inside. What I think is interesting is that, being adjustable like that, you could get a relatively thin tissue box and hide valuables or home protection in the vacant area below the tissues. I doubt too many thieves would think to look in a tissue holder for valuables.
customer_reviews.author: AM from WA

customer_reviews.title: Nice tiisue box
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 of these to cover some tissue boxes. I was always pulling out tissues and the tissue box would move, too: aggravating. These tissue box covers preclude that. Also, they are durable and attractive. My wife loves them. I am ordering more. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore J Pantenberg

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Fits Large Boxes
customer_reviews.text: Flexible enough for different size boxes. The large COSTCO Kleenex boxes would not fit in the others. Of course with the others you could take the tissues out. This one has an adjustment for the boxes. The large ones we use, I just don't use the adjustment things. Looks good if a bit large.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Cooperberg

customer_reviews.title: Simple easy design.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this tissue box holder and the ability to have different size boxes fit in it. It’s kept up really well - I have it in a guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looking for the perfect tissue box
customer_reviews.text: The first tissue box was defective.... immediately mailed a replacement. Looking for the perfect tissue box? This is it! The tissue box is cleverly designed. Very pleased. If every company served their customers as Pandpal, the world would be a better place.
customer_reviews.author: T. Procopio

customer_reviews.title: Good Product. Suggestion
customer_reviews.text: Fast Delivery, Good Product. Suggestion, use a small depth tissue box and create a great -underneath Hiding Place for Valuables and/or Home-Defense "Tools"
customer_reviews.author: rolede

customer_reviews.title: Large Tissue Box cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could fit any/all sized boxes in it. But it is REALLY big. Good quality, but I would think twice before buying again because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Lady V

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this box. It didn't work for what I wanted it to do, but it is a sturdy tissue holder. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The box is adjustable to fit different size tissue boxes. The box appears to be made out of bamboo so appearance very nice. Weight was okay.
customer_reviews.author: MPage

customer_reviews.title: Fits Costco size tissue boxes!
customer_reviews.text: I know it's silly, but I really love this tissue box. It fits those giant Costco boxes of tissues perfectly. Clean lines, well made, sturdy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Harriette Knight

customer_reviews.title: and the little slats that hold the box up fall out too easily if you tilt it at all before adding the ...
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I needed for the big Puffs box. I had to adjust it up to the third slot, and the little slats that hold the box up fall out too easily if you tilt it at all before adding the cover. I can see them getting misplaced as they are not attached to anything. It will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: Large quantity box of tissues fits perfectly. Product seems to be made very well. I like that it had shims to insert for other size rectangle boxes. Bamboo is a light color. It will darken with age. I wish there was a darker finish option. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PearProjexts

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: The tissue box is totally covered by this bamboo cover. A big box or small box of tissue works in this. There is a removable bottom that you can choose a level to suit the size of the tissue box. The opening for the tissue is the right size. You can't see the box at all, just the clear cellophane that you pull the tissue through.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Great tissue box cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality - looks very nice in my bathroom and true to description it can accommodate any size rectangular box of tissues.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferEnright

customer_reviews.title: Best Tissue Box on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best Tissue Box on the market. I can't understand why someone did not come up with this idea before.Now I don't have to care what size rectangular box of tissues that I buy...they all fit! The box is well made, and looks great anywhere in the house. Thanks for inventing this box. One of the best things I have bought in a long time, it is so functional, and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use in our bathrooms for a more aesthetic look. It was difficult to find a rectangular tissue box made of teak or bamboo. I like the versatility of the box as it accommodates varies heights of tissue boxes. It is larger than I anticipated but that is on me as the dimensions are stated. Overall a very good product with a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: We take tissue very seriously in my house
customer_reviews.text: It embarrasses me how much I like this item. Now, no matter what size tissue the husband brings home from the store, it looks nice. Be aware that the box feels quite a bit bigger than a regular box of tissue. There is an inner box and an outer box, and the combination of both layers does add up. But we do take tissue seriously, and a serious holder with big presence is just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Lars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this box!! It is beautiful and very well made. It arrived just as promised! I love that it will fit so many different size boxes. I actually am using it to hold a box of disposable gloves, it is PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as advertised and fits perfectly in my already bamboo decorated bathroom. It is a bit "boxy", but that is what it is, a box to hold any size tissue box. The price was reasonable and the construction is sound. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. RMB

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concept. I bought 2; I like it so much. And bamboo is always the best!
customer_reviews.author: MetamorphicRubbish

customer_reviews.title: A clever and innovative design
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tissue box holder. It's clean lines and appearance looks at home in most any decor. It's functional in that it can accommodate most any size tissue box. Great pluses. However, the craftsmanship leaves a lot to be desired. my box arrived with the glue joints on two edges starting to come apart (see photos). I'm disappointed because I really like this product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wojtas

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SATISFIED !
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this product ! Soooo glad to finally have a beautiful cover that "adjusts" to the "height" of various standard size (4.5 x 9.0) tissue products AND covers up the often ugly print designs on so many tissue boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart design & wood feels sealed for humidity!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 for daughter to check out. Liked them fine, so ordered her 8 more. She uses Command Strips to put them on walls. The slats were too thin on the 2nd order, & fall to the floor. Would like to see them cut to fit the grooves like the 1st two boxes. I understand they were designed to place on a flat surface where this would not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dava Deaton

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love this tissue box cover! Quality construction, ingenious simple design works for all size rectangular tissues.
customer_reviews.author: L. Chatain

customer_reviews.title: This box is great! I never have to worry about the size ...
customer_reviews.text: This box is great! I never have to worry about the size of tissue boxes, especially when they go on sale. I currently have the shortest box as I grabbed it on the go and you'd never know with the adjustable wooden strips. Tissue comes out great too so I don't know what the people who say that it tears up the tissues are talking about. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Worked as described
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the dog from running away with the tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: make it right the first time

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, practical, and worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo piece is a beautiful addition to our remodeled bathroom and the adjustable aspect was appealing to us. It can accommodate any size of tissue and the materials are fine quality. This piece is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than advertised, quality tissue box cover.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality product. Tissue boxes fit precisely in it. The construction and materials are top notch. We purchased this as we needed to have our tissue box laying on it's side, inside of a cabinet. With the weight of this box single tissues can be pulled out with out the box moving, or even budging. It is very nice not to have to hold the box down to pull out tissues.
customer_reviews.author: Monte

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: It's even better than I expected it to be The fact that it holds any size box makes it easy to buy any tissues on sale and know that it will fit. It's very attractive and really stands out and looks to be a solid product. I would highly recommend it..
customer_reviews.author: Sam in Boynton Beach

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This was splitting apart straight out of the box! I will try clamping these shut with some added Gorilla glue, but this is a real disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Long Legs

customer_reviews.title: Great tissue box cover
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my large boxes of tissue which was what I was looking for. Looks smart as well
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor B. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: It does what it claims to do! We buy big tissue boxes from costco, and PandPal One Size Fits All Tissue Box Cover is big enough for those. It's nice to finally be able to hide the less than eye-pleasing box art (?).
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Fits any size tissue box.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product less than 6 months and it is coming apart at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Rotties

customer_reviews.title: Slats don't fit right...but does cover the ugly boxes
customer_reviews.text: Aside from being a great way to cover the ugly tissue boxes...it could be made a little better...the 1 wooden stop fall out of the slat which is annoying...while the other jams in so tight it is a pain...I almost wish I purchased the other one I was looking at.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, this one is great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I had a lot of trouble finding a box that could hold different sized tissue boxes. Sometimes I get the smaller packages, sometimes a deeper box. This cover is perfect. There are two little pieces of wood to adjust the height of the box inside. It is just what I needed: the correct size, well-constructed, sleek in design and it blends in well. I'm very pleased, and would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: CyberMar

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it together, it’s nice. The slats can be a little tricky. Much better than a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: KathalinaV

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, too
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my stepmom for Christmas and she loves it! She buys those Costco boxes of Kleenex and this holder actually contains it. Looks nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Work and look great.
customer_reviews.text: These look great and are nicely built. The adjustment feature makes the tissue box fit just right. I bought two and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike N

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: As described in product info. Love that it fits any size rectangular tissue box. Eliminates that annoying whole box lifts up when down to a small amount of tissues. Looks good and fits my decor. I like it so much I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Betlaw

customer_reviews.title: Great! Love the variety of levels
customer_reviews.text: Great! Love the variety of levels. I had smaller Kleenex boxes on hand, a great way to store a second box!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and fits any size tissue box
customer_reviews.text: Nice wood look, any size rectangular tissues will fit: we have used 100-250
customer_reviews.author: Carol and David Melvin

customer_reviews.title: So thankful for outside the box thinking!
customer_reviews.text: Love the versatility, it works great, easy to install! A little imagination goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Z.

customer_reviews.title: This is an impressive and simple adjustable tissue box cover that fits and functions perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Best rectangular tissue box cover ever! I love that it’s adjustable and can fit whatever tissue box size I end up buying on sale. I like the natural wood look, but may stain or paint it to match my bathroom if I decide to get creative. Very cool! Thanks PandPal! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: fits 230 count tissue box
customer_reviews.text: as described. nice smooth finish. no flaws as other reviews mentioned. heavy duty - won't slide all over counter. but, if you plan on moving it from place to place, the bottom will fall out. fits lg Costco 230 count tissue box.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHAN H

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have low bathroom counters and the kleenex box is large and sturdy enough to elevate our lighted magnifier mirror! It will easily accommodate the largest box of Kleenex brand that Costco sells and it doen't even need the support spacers supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia S.

customer_reviews.title: Works well but maybe glue it a little better next time?
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it’s supposed to do but I’ve only had it a short time (a little over a month) and it’s already separating at one of the corners (see photo). I don’t live in a particularly humid climate and I’ve never dropped it so I’m not sure why it would be doing that. Other than that, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We aren't very kind to our Kleenex tissue boxes - the majority of them end up smashed when we get down to the bottom of the box. To help remedy this, I ordered this tissue box cover. I love it! It's perfect and nicely holds the large size 230 count tissues that our family of allergy suffers uses. It's well made and goes well with our decor. I'll be ordering a second one today. Thanks so much, Pandpal!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C

customer_reviews.title: Unglued
customer_reviews.text: Product not well constructed. The Cover is unglued on one side, coming apart. The box is attractive, what we were looking for, but the quality of the construction was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Tissue Box Cover is AMAZING & exactly what I've been looking for! I recommend it for anyone wanting a classy looking tissue box in their home.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Blue

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Tissue Size Box Cover
customer_reviews.text: This eco-friendly tissue box cover looks great on the kitchen counter. It fits a variety of tissue packages which is very nice. It's well constructed and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nona J.

customer_reviews.title: Dont get it wet or drop it
customer_reviews.text: It started coming apart on all corners when I opened it. The delivery box was saturated wet with a very smelly solution which might have caused this. Amazon has been notified and will refund my money and I am attempting to glue it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Greco

customer_reviews.title: BAMBOOOOOzled
customer_reviews.text: It arrived split on two sides. Not a stylish design, looks like Kleenex Koffin
customer_reviews.author: I. Emma Penname

customer_reviews.title: One Size Fits All
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality cover for any size tissue box. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable tissue box is just what I needed to complete my newly renovated master bath, matches with my new vanity counter top. Also, thanks for the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: ljd

customer_reviews.title: perfect tissue box
customer_reviews.text: Seems I never buy the same size box of tissues two times in a row so this holder is perfect and heavy enough it doesn't move around on my end table every time I pull out a tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Can be used with one box or stack two thinner boxes. Color is nice,light tan bamboo color.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Turner

customer_reviews.title: Only one I've found to fit Costco size kleenex boxes.
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are the only ones I've found that fit the large boxes of tissues sold at Costco. They are very attractive and seem to be well made. The fact that slats are included to fit small boxes is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: j p

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Fabulous cover! Great quality bamboo, love the adjustable feature, no more worrying about what size box will fit in my tissue box covers again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Definitely what I was looking for even matches my existing wood trim in the room it's in
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Norton

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one and not the otheres.
customer_reviews.text: Tissue box cover arrived in perfect condition. The best feature of this product is it is adjustable and fits most size rectangular tissue boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Jan C-G

customer_reviews.title: looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Actually haven't used it yet. I'm remodeling my bathroom and it matches my decor. Looks great in the package. Well protected during shipping. I'm sure I will be pleased. Rick.
customer_reviews.author: T Pain

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed, attractive, professional, and simultaneously earthy product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Contemplative Psychiatry

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust to the size of your Kleenex box. AND it looks great on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't quite fit. Have to jam/forcefully push the box in every time
customer_reviews.author: Xt

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD  Puff Plus Bj Size fits
customer_reviews.text: Works well as I use puff plus large size bought at Bj and the box fits inside. Looks as pictured... when cover on you can see the box but you can also pull tissue out .
customer_reviews.author: lalaw

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how versatile this is. Holds many different size boxes.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nicely built tissue cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nicely built tissue cover. I am using it for my truck to tuck in between the seats and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: potatoehead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really beautiful on our kitchen island; doesn't look like a tissue box; even my husband likes it! we just ordered a second one for the bedroom; love these because you can modify the size.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice

customer_reviews.title: Nicely constructed and finished
customer_reviews.text: Well engineered. Nicely constructed and finished. Makes an attractive accent of what would otherwise be a necessary eyesore during allergy season.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Evan Todd Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality and fits perfectly. I use Scotts tissues 250 count and the box slid right in and dispensed better than out of the original box. Looks so lovely and elegant and can hold any size. What an awesome value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice one
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, however the top and bottom does not hold together tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Petr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and well constructed. The finish has small but noticeable flaws, otherwise it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Clever design, beautiful eco-friendly tissue box cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this beautiful bamboo box to cover up some cheap tissue boxes to add a home feel to my office at work. I like the clever design that allows me to use this for any tissue box size I could find on the market.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tissue box holder!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first one I ordered so I ordered three more! I love that the holder adjusts to fit various sizes of tissue boxes. It's modern, attractive and smart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further
customer_reviews.text: High quality construction and very attractive. Ingenious design allows use of any depth tissue box. Before we needed a tissue box color/design that would fit our bathroom decor, now we can buy the best high quality tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Novak

customer_reviews.title: Just got this and what a gem of a box ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and what a gem of a box! Smooth bamboo wood and the adjustable size rocks! Also, very visually appealing too.
customer_reviews.author: diananotdiane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this tissue holder as it covers the entire new larger box size but also accommodates smaller boxes
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mac

product_meta.title: One Size Fits All Tissue Box Cover for Any Rectangular Tissue Box, Fit Rectangular Paper Boxes, Office Kitchen Bath Living, Adjustable Bamboo Wooden Holder Dispenser by PandPal
feature_bullets: ONE SIZE FITS ALL BOX COVER: The PandPal tissue rectangular dispenser beats the competition with its smart one size fits all design. Its internal mechanism can be adjusted for a variable height so you can fit tissue boxes of any size.

EASY FILL: Most tissue dispensers require you to fill them by throwing away the brand box, a procedure that takes some time. Our tissue holder eliminates the need for that. Simply adjust its height to fit your purchased facial tissue paper box and insert the box directly into our holder.

ECO FRIENDLY MATERIAL: Made from 100 percent real, premium bamboo, this cute tissue holder is completely natural and ECO friendly. No chemicals or engineered wood were involved in the construction of this novelty bathroom or kitchen accessory. Be
environmentally conscious and purchase a tissue box cover that is 100 percent biodegradable.

SMART FOR ANY ROOM: A tissue dispenser is useful in any room, and the PandPal bamboo holder has an attractive appearance that will look great in your living room, kitchen, dining room, bathroom or even a formal setting like your office or executive desk. Or maybe a modern and stylish toilet accessory for your kids and family.
CUSTOMER CONFIDENT: We are confident that you will love the PandPal tissue dispenser.
